CreateCollectionArea.what-do-you-want-to-do: What do you want to do?
CreateCollectionArea.language-of-the-query-and-search-results: Language of the query and search results
CreateCollectionArea.retrieval-mode-keyword: Use this to find specific words.\nSupports operators like AND / OR / NOT.
CreateCollectionArea.retrieval-mode-vector:
Use this to search for broader topics or information
that can be described in many different ways.

Note: this might return almost all documents, but sorted
so that the most relevant ones are at the top.
Only supports quoted phrases, not the AND / OR / NOT operators.
CreateCollectionArea.retrieval-mode-hybrid:
Combines keyword and meaning search.

Note: this might return almost all documents, but sorted
so that the most relevant ones are at the top.
Only supports quoted phrases, not the AND / OR / NOT operators.
CreateCollectionArea.add-filters-and-change-search-options: Add filters and change search options
CreateCollectionArea.vector-search-not-available-for-this-dat: Meaning / hybrid search is not yet available for this dataset.
CreateCollectionArea.query-operators-not-supported-for-vector:
The operators AND / OR are not supported for 'meaning' and 'hybrid' searches.
Please use filters and quoted phrases here or switch to 'keyword' search.
CreateCollectionArea.use-double-quotes-instead-of-single-quot: Note: use double quotes instead of single quotes to search for phrases.
CreateCollectionArea.auto-set-filters: Auto-detect language, required filters and search strategy
CreateCollectionArea.preview-feature: This feature is in preview and might not work as expected.

LoginButton.you-need-to-accept-the-tos: You need to accept the terms of services and privacy policy to register.
LoginButton.warning-about-limited-features:
Only a limited set of features is available without logging in.
We recommend creating an account above, its free and just one step.
LoginButton.please-accept-the-tos: Please accept the terms of service and privacy policy
